election_record.label: Kentucky 1820 Speaker of the House Pro Tempore, Special

office.name: Speaker of the House Pro Tempore

role.title: Speaker of the House Pro Tempore

overview.note: "On Monday last in consequence of the absence of the Speaker, the House of Representatives proceeded to the election of Speaker for the occasion. Col Robert B. McAfee and Maj. Thomas C. Howard were put in nomination and the vote stood for McAfee, 41, for Howard, 22. McAfee was declared duly elected, ...On Tuesday morning the Speaker, Mr. Thompson, resumed his duties." Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY). November 16, 1820.

election_record.reference: Argus of Western America (Frankfort, KY). November 16, 1820.
